error.name: OSPF_DEFAULT_METRIC_INVALID_RANGE
error.output: \n Error! Invalid value for Default Metric. It can either be '0' or in the range (1..16777214).

error.name: OSPF_DEFAULT_ROUTE_METRIC_INVALID_RANGE
error.output: \n Error! Invalid value for Default Route Metric. It can either be '0' or in the range (1..16777214).

error.name: OSPF_EXTLSDB_LIMIT_INVALID_RANGE
error.output: \n Error! Invalid value for External LSDB Limit. Enter value in the range (-1..2147483647).

error.name: OSPF_VLINK_TRANSITAREA_STUB_NSSA
error.output: \n Error! Transit area of a virtual link cannot be stub or nssa area.

error.name: OSPF_VLINK_RTRID_MYRTRID
error.output: \n Error! Virtual link neighbor router id can't be same as system routerid.

error.name: OSPF_VLINK_AREA_BACKBONE
error.output: \n Error! Transit area of a virtual link cannot be backbone area.

error.name: OSPF_MUST_BE_DISABLED
error.output: \n Error! OSPF must be disabled before changing the Router Id.

error.name: OSPF_AREA_RANGE_CONFLICT
error.output: \n Error! Conflicting address range exists for this network.
